title: If I don't work & can't pay fidya for not fasting, must my husband or children do it assim al hakeem
transcript: uh if my mother has a chronic disease and cannot pass Ramadan I know that she has has to expiate by feeding a PO poor person for each mistake if my mother does not work and has no income does the obligation of her experation fall on me in case that my father is not willing to do it as fasting is part of her obligation feeding is also part of her obligation which means if she doesn't have the money she's not obliged to feed someone for the days she had missed due to her illness chronic illness or due to her age now if there is someone who's volunteering such as her husband or her son alhamdulillah but if they don't want to pay she has no sin on her and Allah Knows Best
